	head clothing

		[LAYER_GROUP]
		[LAYER:CLOTHING_CAP_WHITE:HUMAN_CLOTHING:0:1]
			[CONDITION_ITEM_WORN:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HELM:ITEM_HELM_CAP]
			[CONDITION_PROFESSION_CATEGORY:STONEWORKER]
			[CONDITION_MATERIAL_FLAG:WOVEN_ITEM]
			[SHUT_OFF_IF_ITEM_PRESENT:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HELM:ITEM_HELM_HELM:ITEM_HELM_HOOD:ITEM_HELM_TURBAN:ITEM_HELM_VEIL_HEAD:ITEM_HELM_SCARF_HEAD]
			[SHUT_OFF_IF_ITEM_PRESENT:BY_CATEGORY:BODY_UPPER:ARMOR:ITEM_ARMOR_CLOAK]
		[LAYER:CLOTHING_CAP_BLACK:HUMAN_CLOTHING:1:1]
			[CONDITION_ITEM_WORN:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HELM:ITEM_HELM_CAP]
			[CONDITION_PROFESSION_CATEGORY:NONE]
			[CONDITION_MATERIAL_FLAG:WOVEN_ITEM]
			[CONDITION_DYE:BLACK]
			[SHUT_OFF_IF_ITEM_PRESENT:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HELM:ITEM_HELM_HELM:ITEM_HELM_HOOD:ITEM_HELM_TURBAN:ITEM_HELM_VEIL_HEAD:ITEM_HELM_SCARF_HEAD]
			[SHUT_OFF_IF_ITEM_PRESENT:BY_CATEGORY:BODY_UPPER:ARMOR:ITEM_ARMOR_CLOAK]
		[LAYER:CLOTHING_CAP_LGRAY:HUMAN_CLOTHING:2:1]
			[CONDITION_ITEM_WORN:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HELM:ITEM_HELM_CAP]
			[CONDITION_PROFESSION_CATEGORY:MINER:MERCHANT]

		[LAYER_GROUP]

		stubble

			[CONDITION_TISSUE_LAYER:BY_CATEGORY:HEAD:HAIR]
				[TISSUE_MIN_LENGTH:1]
				[TISSUE_MAX_LENGTH:49]
